question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. cow in the screen
B. man in blue
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The cow in the screen (projected image) is clearly on a distant wall, while the man in blue is standing on the stage closer to the foreground, making the cow further away in 3D space.
